name: Hand-Embroidered Silk Scarf
description: This exquisite hand-embroidered silk scarf is a testament to the rich heritage of Indian craftsmanship. Each piece is meticulously crafted by skilled artisans using traditional techniques passed down through generations.
details: Unique piece with slight variations making each one special
careInstructions: Dry clean only. Store folded in a cool, dry place. Avoid direct sunlight to prevent fading. Iron on low heat if necessary.

name: Embroidered Cotton Dupatta
description: Beautiful hand-embroidered cotton dupatta with traditional motifs.
careInstructions: Machine wash cold with similar colors. Dry in shade. Iron on medium heat if necessary.

name: Zari Work Silk Stole
description: Elegant silk stole featuring intricate zari work and delicate embroidery.
careInstructions: Dry clean only. Handle with care.

name: Block Print Linen Scarf
description: Hand block-printed linen scarf with contemporary geometric patterns.
careInstructions: Gentle hand wash. Dry in shade. Iron on medium heat.
